snippet.title: Puff. (Official Game Trailer)
snippet.description:
Puff, puff, give. Puff, puff, give. 

With little regard for traditional game pitch protocol, I'm going to begin this game description with the dubious "if so and so had a kid" metaphor: If Flappy Bird and Downwell did some baby makin’ that created a love child with the shakes and a propensity for dubstep, this game would be it.

With controls that work like hand churned butter, and be cold trippin' like Bob Dylan, you need to tap, shoot, dodge, and weave your way through a sewer full of slime balls, eyeballs, goofballs, and water balls. 

If this game doesn't make you twitch, you are a robot. 

Puff is coming February 23, 2017, only on the App Store.

FEATURES:

• Fast, smooth, and simple control system
• Progressive difficulty
• Power ups
• Replay Kit recording for your badass kills and close calls
• Sweet classic 8-bit graphics
• Lots of baddies that are, like, super bad
• Game Centre keeps tabs on your kills count
• Retro dubstep soundtrack you can move your body too like Elaine
• Retro gaming in full effect
